name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text:
As an independent nation, Ukraine‚Äôs rights to maintain its national sovereignty, defend its territorial integrity, and manage its associations within the global order are absolute. 

Now is the time for the Free World to rise up in defense of liberty.

My full statement ‚§µÔ∏è https://t.co/57xLV6uzJM

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: By strengthening Ukraine‚Äôs position, demonstrating a unified global coalition, and forcing Putin to grasp the devastating consequences Russia will suffer ‚Äì the world may avert the full breakout of war the likes of which it has not seen in nearly a century.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Now is the time for the Free World to rise up in defense of liberty.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: The Free World has a responsibility to uphold the tenants of the Budapest Memorandum and Minsk Agreement, and to deter further Russian invasion of Ukraine through harsh and decisive political, economic, and defensive measures.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Ukraine‚Äôs security and its ability to exercise self-determination cannot be bargained away by Russian fiat ‚Äì they must be guaranteed.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Putin, however, is testing the West‚Äôs commitments to the international rule of law and the mutual defense compacts that have preserved peace on the European continent throughout the post-World War II era.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: As an independent nation, Ukraine‚Äôs rights to maintain its national sovereignty, defend its territorial integrity, and manage its associations within the global order are absolute.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Ukraine is not a threat to Russia, but Ukraine‚Äôs independence and democracy jeopardizes Putin‚Äôs stranglehold on power, and imperils his standing among the Russian people. Driven by his quest for self-preservation, Putin has fraudulently built the case for war.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: This region of the world should be free and prosperous, not denied hope and opportunity by a corrupt and merciless tyrant.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Putin is a murderous dictator whose objective is rigid control of society. He accomplishes his barbaric schemes by suppressing human rights, eliminating independent media, assassinating political opponents, and limiting economic opportunity.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Now, at Vladimir Putin‚Äôs direction, Russia has illegally declared that sovereign Ukrainian territory is independent, and ordered troops to the region. This hostility is reminiscent of the tragic carnage unleashed by Putin over the years in Georgia, Moldova, and Armenia.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Through its rapid escalation of conflict, breach of cease-fire agreements, and hostile and irresponsible rhetoric, Russia has flagrantly rejected the norms of legal and civil behavior to which respectable nation states have long adhered.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: The ongoing journey to form a more perfect Union requires an understanding and acknowledgement of the past which lies behind us. As we lift up and embrace the history of Black Americans, we also celebrate the next chapter ‚Äì and the ones to follow ‚Äì that are already being written.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: To properly recognize this vast legacy, however, requires an extension beyond the bounds of one single month. Black history is not separate from American history ‚Äì it is foundational to American history.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Throughout February, we honor the history of Black Americans in writing the long and unfinished work that is the American story.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: On this and all days, let us seek to better the condition of all humankind. Let us further dedicate ourselves to continuing the valiant mission of Dr. King.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: His call for brotherhood reverberates across generations. Let America hear his voice. Let our society respect its own pluralism which serves as the very bedrock of our nation. America is precious among nations ‚Äì let us treat her and one another that way.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: The Reverend Dr. King‚Äôs life is a living legacy. His inspired call to justice intersects directly with America‚Äôs own struggle to attain its highest ideals for all people. America remains an unfinished work.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Today‚Äôs commemoration of his life and work provides an opportunity for remembrance, reflection, and rededication. Who are we as a people and a nation?

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text:
National holidays are established in memory of the very few whose vision and raw courage define America‚Äôs soul and moral character.

On Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, we honor a giant among men who envisioned an America that truly lived up to the promises our founders decreed.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text:
RT @TaylorPopielarz: New:

For 41 minutes on Jan. 6, 2021, Ohio @RepMarcyKaptur was trapped in a balcony without her phone as the Capitol w‚Ä¶

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: While the events of that day were appalling, they have only deepened my resolve to help heal the nation, bridge the divide, and safeguard our democracy. For on the success of this endeavor, I believe the fate of present and future generations certainly depends.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Political violence, on the other hand, is not a legitimate mechanism to enact change. It is an act of cowardice, and a stain against our republic.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: In America, we have the awesome ability to debate, disagree, compromise, and legislate for the common good ‚Äì and we can do so through the ballot box.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Some officers ultimately lost their lives, while many more left with wounds that they still bear to this day. All courageously upheld their oaths in service to this nation, and in service to democracy.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: On January 6th, 2021, I watched as U.S. Capitol Police officers defended the Capitol complex, along with the lives of thousands of people.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: One year ago today, the hallowed grounds of the United States Capitol, and the very system of governance that has sustained our country for more than two centuries, came under attack.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text:
As always, if there is ever anything with which our office can be helpful in the year ahead, we are ready and able to assist however we can.

Onward!

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: I will continue the fight to help create good-paying jobs, rebuild our infrastructure, lower the cost of healthcare, and support our children, families, and seniors.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: In 2022, I will continue to work with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to ensure that our communities not only recover, but are strengthened for the days ahead.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Thank you to the healthcare heroes, first responders, grocery and food workers, small business owners, teachers, and so many more hardworking men and women who keep us moving.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text:
Last year was one of enormous change, particularly with the pandemic touching nearly every facet of our daily lives.

Through it all, I feel a deep sense of gratitude for those who continued to provide essential services that we all rely upon.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: No one is above the law, not even the president. Donald Trump is a threat to our republic and should be removed from office without delay.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: It has taken the strong moral courage of whistleblowers, public servants, veterans, and legislators to bring us to this solemn moment in our nation‚Äôs history, but first and foremost it was the president‚Äôs own actions that started us down this unfortunate path.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: I would like my constituents to know that a vote for impeachment is not one that has been whipped up by Democratic leadership ‚Äì from its start, it has been driven by the public. Our office has fielded hundreds of calls from citizens urging impeachment.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: President Trump is guilty of abusing his power and strengthening America‚Äôs adversaries. He has repeatedly obstructed Congress in his failure to comply with lawful subpoenas. His actions have subverted U.S. national interests and emboldened Putin.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: President Trump has failed to defend our Constitution. Rather than stand up to Putin, Trump has aided him ‚Äì hastening Russian interference in our 2016 election and withholding military aid from Ukraine to extort their interference in our 2020 election for his own personal gain.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: At Putin‚Äôs direction, Russia illegally invaded our ally Ukraine in 2014. As Ukrainians defend Europe‚Äôs eastern flank, 14,000 have already died at Putin‚Äôs hand with over 2 million more displaced.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: Putin has sought to sow disarray and destabilize our democracy and the NATO Alliance. He has coordinated murders, election hacking, propaganda, and the entrapment of willing fools who would put their own self-interests over liberty ‚Äì President Trump among them.

name: Marcy Kaptur
tweet_text: But like so many patriotic Americans in Northern Ohio and communities across the country, I am deeply concerned by President Trump‚Äôs systematic betrayal of our values and national security in favor of our adversary Vladimir Putin.

name: Marcy Kaptur
